CdrDoc.CdrDocXml:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl = "http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version = "1.0" xmlns:cdr = "cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr">
<xsl:output method = "text"/>
<xsl:template match = "/"> <xsl:apply-templates select = "CTGovProtocol"/> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match = "CTGovProtocol"> <xsl:variable name = "title"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test = "normalize-space(OfficialTitle) != ''"> <xsl:value-of select = "normalize-space(OfficialTitle)"/> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select = "normalize-space(BriefTitle)"/> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name = "docTitle"> <xsl:value-of select = "normalize-space(IDInfo/OrgStudyID)"/> <xsl:for-each select = "IDInfo/SecondaryID"> <xsl:value-of select = "concat(';', normalize-space(.))"/> </xsl:for-each> <xsl:value-of select = "concat(';', $title)"/> </xsl:variable> <xsl:value-of select = "substring($docTitle, 1, 255)"/> </xsl:template>
</xsl:transform>
